contents.text: Welcome to The Hive, San Francisco’s premier AI-driven visual intelligence solutions provider.
For Hive Data services and support, press 1.
To speak with our sales team about our machine learning data labeling marketplace, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales department. Your call is important to us, and a specialist will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: I need a pricing and feature overview for your data labeling marketplace.
I’d like to find out how to apply as a contract data labeler on your machine learning marketplace, and what qualifications you require.
I want a detailed quote on throughput, pricing, and SLA for your ML data-labeling marketplace.
I’d like to speak with sales about buying data labeling services.
Get pricing and subscription details for labeling my physics experiment images

contents.text: For technical assistance with your Hive Data labeling projects, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to technical support. One of our data labeling experts will be with you momentarily.

navigationGoals: I'm encountering errors in my current labeling project and need technical support to resolve them.
I need technical help with my current Hive Data labeling project—the annotation tool is failing to save my work.
I need help debugging my data-annotation pipeline—I'm encountering labeling errors on my vision dataset.
I need technical help with my Hive Data labeling project.
Fix an error in my annotation project that’s preventing me from saving segmentation masks

contents.text: For our AI-driven predictive analytics and media extraction services, press 2.
To learn about Hive Predict’s advanced forecasting solutions, press 1.
Thank you for your patience. Please hold while we connect you to our Hive Predict specialists.

navigationGoals: I'd like to schedule a demo and get pricing details for your predictive analytics forecasting solutions.
I want to discuss how Hive Predict can forecast equipment maintenance needs and learn about pricing and setup time.
I want to evaluate your AI-driven predictive analytics API for time-series forecasting.
I want to learn about setting up predictive analytics with Hive Predict.
Learn about trialing Hive Predict’s forecasting tools for my time-series experiment data

contents.text: To explore Hive Media’s video and image indexing services, press 2.
Thank you for holding. A Hive Media representative will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: I want to integrate your video and image indexing service into our media workflow and need guidance.
I’m looking for guidance on integrating your video and image indexing API to organize surveillance footage efficiently.
I want to integrate your video/image indexing microservice into our media processing workflow.
I need assistance with your video and image indexing service.
Ask about indexing and metadata tagging for my high-speed lab video recordings
